---------------------------------
Also remember Turnbull has written two ninja books;
the earlier 
Firebird hardcover (or its reprint) is better than the
Osprey book.



HI

if you really want to read one or the other then I
suggest the previous book. 

The new one is more like a comic for kids than a book
anyone can use for any form of research

paul
